descriptionHTML:
Say hello to the Relaxing Thoughts "Valentine Edition" watch face!
It's completely free and it is stylish at any time - not only for valentines season.
Vintage design meets fuzzy watch face.

NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.

* Choose between 5 languages: English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Português
* Works with round and square watches
* With date and battery indicators
* Configuration available on the watch

Graphics: http://www.vecteezy.com/ (user freevector & carterart)
